code: import{BRIDE_FULLNAME,GROOM_FULLNAME,LOCATION,WEDDING_DATE}from"../../const";import coverImage from"../../image/cover.png";import{LazyDiv}from"../lazyDiv";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DAY_OF_WEEK=["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"];export const Cover=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LazyDiv,{className:"card cover",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wedding-date",children:[WEDDING_DATE.format("YYYY"),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"divider"}),WEDDING_DATE.format("MM"),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"divider"}),WEDDING_DATE.format("DD")]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wedding-day-of-week",children:DAY_OF_WEEK[WEDDING_DATE.day()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:coverImage,alt:"sample"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"subtitle",children:"Save the date for the wedding of"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"names",children:[GROOM_FULLNAME,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"divider"}),BRIDE_FULLNAME]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"info",children:WEDDING_DATE.format("YYYY년 MMMM D일 dddd A h시")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"info",children:LOCATION})]});};
